name: @metreeca/tile
description: A lightweight Preact toolkit for rapid REST/JSON-LD frontend development

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md dist && copyup 'code/**/*.css' dist
scripts.issue: npm run build && npm publish --access public ./dist
scripts.share: npm run build && for i in work/*; do cp -R dist/* $i/node_modules/@metreeca/tile; done
